#+begin_src nim
namedBin["name"] = "expr" # nwnt version = pkgVersion # fae

paravim

installExt = @[
"nim", "txt", "ttf", "glsl", "c", "h",
when defined(windows):
"dll"
elif defined(macosx):
"dylib"
elif defined(linux):
"so"

]

include metar/version

version = metarVersion

plz

version = CompileDate.replace("-", ".")
